    • Method Detail

      • setGame

        public void setGame​(Game game)
        When Game starts it calls setgame(this) to set this client's game to that Game instance. When game is over Game class sets this game to null
        Parameters:
        game -

      • run

        public void run()
        Does HELLO handshake with client. Then waits for succesful login. And then starts loop to handle client messages until disconnection
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable

      • sendHello

               throws serverUnavailableException
